name: SOOM!
description:
Soom is a 90's styled fps. In other words it is a Doom clone. 

I do not know if it is just me, but I find shooting guys (in games obviously) and listening to classical music suitable. So I added classical music to the game. It may sound weird to you, but I find it really entertaining.

I made the game in Raycasting Game Maker if you are interested.

The game offers 3 types of weapons and 12 levels. I finished the game in 17 minutes. You can watch it on YouTube.

Finally I would be really happy if you posted your favorite level in the comments.

Enjoy...
